name: Pixelite Realms
description:
The realm of Pixelite, a land of friend and foe, many dangers and great fortune. The inhabitants are as diverse as the level of technology they wield. Using skill and weaponry, battle and explore the Realm of Pixelite for loot and upgrades. The battles begin as the realm of good people of Pixelite has been overrun by the evil robot army of Cyclonius. Battle the rooms and upgrade your toons.

Collect and transform your inhabitants of Pixelite into the mightiest toon's in the Realm.

 Download for free on the Google Play Store or Windows Platform.


Features:

  •  Play in a retro style environment.
  • Unlock map locations, weapons, rooms and toons.
  • Raid levels, evade traps and loot discover loot items.
  • Daily Rewards and quests.
  • Collect and upgrade your toons.
  • Discover hidden secret areas. 

Whats Next?

  • iOS version currently in testing and will be available very soon.
  •  New Levels have been completed and close to release.
  • Save game data to cloud. This will make it possible to switch between devices and platforms.
  • Furthering GUI visual enhacements.
  • Boss Fight.
